title: whats the procedure of entry point ucrtbase.terminate could not be located in the dynamic link libr
body: when i try to launch the game this thing keeps popping out and closes up the game."the procedure entry point ucrtbase.terminate could not be located in the dynamic link library api-ms-win-crt-runtime-I1-1--0.dll. " i even uninstalled the game and installed it again and i keep getting the smae message plzz help

replies.body:
Whelp, that's one wordy error that's for sure! I did some digging and it seems like that dll is most commonly tied to Microsoft's C++. Sometimes that error can pop up if the program trying to use C++ (League in this case) is trying to pull on those files but it can't find them for one reason or another. 

We can try [**redownloading it directly**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) to see if we can get you back on the Rift. There are some instructions below the download button on that site, but let me know if you have any questions!
